short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merges cards with the same name (eventually same configs too) together and gives the total number of them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Merges cards with the same name on the sending/receiving page together and gives the total number of them.

A button is added near the tag button so you can easily merge the cards with the same name together.
